Important

For urgent medical concerns like chest pain, heavy bleeding, or signs of a stroke, dial 911 or head to the nearest emergency room immediately. For general health advice or non-emergency situations, contact 811.

About This Service

This website provides near real-time emergency room wait times based on publicly available data. Please note that some hospitals may not have live data available as it is not provided on their websites. Data is refreshed approximately every 15 minutes, which is the average update frequency for most hospitals. The most recent update was at: 5/24/2025, 3:34:40 PM
This hospital provides real-time data.
